english.headache: Take paracetamol and rest. Drink plenty water.
english.malaria: Use antimalarial drugs like ACT. Visit a clinic if serious.
english.fever: Take fever medicine and monitor. If it persists, go to hospital.

hausa.ciwon kai: Sha paracetamol ka huta. Ka sha ruwa sosai.
hausa.zazzabi: Yi amfani da maganin zazzabi. Ka ga likita idan ya yi tsanani.
hausa.maleriya: Yi amfani da maganin maleriya kamar ACT.

pidgin.headache: Take paracetamol, rest well and drink plenty water.
pidgin.malaria: Use malaria medicine like ACT. If e bad, go clinic.
pidgin.fever: Take medicine wey go reduce fever. If e no stop, go hospital.
